meanings.sent1: The sight of disembowelments in the horror movie made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The forensic team examined the disembowelments to determine the cause of death.
meanings.sent3: During the Halloween party, the fake disembowelments made everyone scream in mock horror.
meanings.sent4: The aftermath of the battle showed the gruesome disembowelments of fallen soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The vivid description of the disembowelments left a lasting impression on the audience.
